title: Jean-freezing and one-step dressing: 8 style tips from Veronika Heilbrunner
text:
Ask any fashion editor whose wardrobe they most covet and the name Veronika Heilbrunner is likely to be uttered. The Munich-born model-turned-fashion-editor-turned-entrepreneur – and face of Mango’s latest #BEanICON campaign – has become one of the industry’s most influential tastemakers and a perennial go-to for outfit inspiration. Her unique brand of feminine-meets-masculine chic sets her apart from the rest of the street-style troop: think statement dresses teamed with clumpy boots and androgynous tailoring paired with ladylike bags.

Her approach to new-season dressing? Though a self-confessed last-minute shopper, Heilbrunner has an expert-eye for the pieces that will not only deliver on the style...
